addAddress(address).details: adds a given address to the whitelist

isWhitelisted(address).details: returns true if a given address is whitelisted, false if not

returns._0: true if the address is whitelisted, false if not

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._nftManagerName: the name of the NFT Manager contract
params._syntheticNftName: the name of the synthetic NFT contract

removeAddress(address).details: removes a given address from the whitelist

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: A contract to keep track of all contract in the system

deploySyntheticNFT(bytes32,string,string.notice: deploy and register the synthetic NFT contract

getContractAddress(bytes32).notice: retrieve a contract address from a given name

permitToMint(bytes32,bytes32).notice: give a permission to mint NFTs

updateContract(bytes32,address).notice: update a contract address from a given name
